cardPackage.description: Premium Banking is a new perspective on your money and your life. This package gets you a range of exclusive services and lifestyle benefits that will help you reach your financial goals.

bulletPoints: R190.00 per month
Easily apply for an overdraft online
Debit card with contactless tap and pay
One card credit card solution: access your debit, credit or savings account with one card
View and pay bills online using the walletdoc app or website
Keep all card and payment details in your MasterPass digital wallet
Minimum income: R25 000 pm

extraInfo.title: Included in your monthly fee
bulletPoints: Access to online banking
No data required to access mobile app
Unlimited NotifyMe SMS notifications
Unlimited card swipes
Seven Absa ATM cash withdrawals
Five Absa ATM cash deposits
24/7 dedicated Premium Line available on 0860 109 085 | +2711 501 5006
Premium chat service for banking, financial, investment and home loan advice
Priority bankers in selected branches
Access to a financial advisor
Free financial needs analysis
Find the right investment for you with the Virtual Investor tool

Stockbroking Account: Invest and trade in all local JSEâ„¢-listed equities (shares), warrants, share instalments and all exchange-traded funds (ETFs) as well as offshore in over 25 exchanges worldwide.

extraInfo.title: Save or invest with:
bulletPoints: Investor Plus: Grow your investment and have easy access to your money when you need it.
Dynamic Fixed Deposit: You get to choose the deposit amount, your investment term and how much money you want immediate access to.
50% off the monthly fees on a Premium Banking cheque account for your spouse
Free MegaU account and app for children under 19
R25 000 lump sum death benefit
Education protector
Free will
Retrenchment Cover of R10 000 (R5 000 payable over two months)
Disability Cover of R10 000 (R5 000 payable over two months)
8 Take-me-Home trips per year

extraInfo.title: Add Absa Rewards and get great benefits such as:
bulletPoints: Real cash back when you use your Absa card*
50% discount on movie tickets at Nu Metro cinemas nationwide*
As much as 15% Cash Rewards every time you shop or fill up at Sasol*
Get foreign bank notes for 22 of the world's major currencies and we can order currency for you, should we not have it at our counters
Free travel insurance on your credit card
Preferential rates at Bidvest lounges on your Premium Banking Credit Card

extraInfo.title: Use four different currencies from one card with the Multi-currency Cash Passport
bulletPoints: Re-load your card and earn as much as R3000 in Absa Cash Rewards. Simply re-load by phoning our call centre on 0860 151 151
International Savings made easy: open a Currency Investment Account in one of 17 currencies to protect yourself against fluctuations of the Rand.
SWIFT (bank-to-bank): Send money from your bank account to an account abroad with SWIFT transfers.
Western Union: A fast, reliable, person-to-person transfer service, and convenient way to send and receive money around the world.
